name: Flippy Golf
description:
ROTATION

Game about a golf ball trying to do its best! All graphics, font and SFX sounds used in this game are free to use from Kenney assets library.

Game made for Kenney Jam 2021 (theme - rotation) in Godot Engine.

Controls options:

Keyboard: WASD or arrow keys - move, Space - jump (if you picked rocket), R - restart, F - switch fullscreen mode

Gamepad: Left stick - move, bottom action button - jump (if you picked rocket), left action button - restart, top action button - switch fullscreen mode

Known issues:

This game works good in web browser, but if you have issues with gamepad controls, try build made for windows.

Some rare times panels can rotate and stay not properly oriented, please restart level, if this happen.
